meanings.definition: At least; at the very least.
meanings.sent1: I wanted a big cake for my birthday party, but leastwise I got a small one.
meanings.sent2: She didn't win the race, but leastwise she finished it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the mouse, but leastwise it got some exercise.
meanings.sent4: His car broke down on the highway, but leastwise he had a good book to read.
meanings.sent5: The storm caused a power outage, but leastwise we had candles to light up the room.

meanings.sent1: I don't think I can make it to the party, leastwise I'll send a gift.
meanings.sent2: She didn't want to go out in the rain, leastwise without an umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The movie was boring, leastwise the popcorn was good.
meanings.sent4: He missed the bus, leastwise he enjoyed the walk home.
meanings.sent5: The store was closed, leastwise he found what he needed online.
